content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend woke me and said; you gotta come see this. i went to the door, looked up and saw an odject comming towards us at a fairly high rate of speed. that's when i asked her to grab the camera. the picture shows a vapor trail which is kind of squiggly, but the object was traveling straight. it stopped in mid air for approxamatly 10-15 seconds then traveled to the left(which is in the photo)and disappeared right after the photo was taken within a second or two.
content.summary: Straight towards me in the sky. stopped in mid air then took off 90 degrees in other direction.

content.detailedDescription: i was just coming out of the grocery store and i was in my car when i saw a disc shaped ufo. it was being chased by 2 helicopters and 1 jet. it hovered for 5 seconds, then it started flying at about 300 mph. then it made a sonic boom. after that, it started going faster and time started to slow down the ufo suddenly dissapeared. the helicopters circled the area and then headed west. that night the ufo was shown on the nightly local news.
content.summary: The ufo was a disc shaped ufo and sped off

content.detailedDescription: i was just coming out of the grocery store and i was in my car when i saw a disc shaped ufo. it was being chased by 2 helicopters and 1 jet. it hovered for 5 seconds, then it started flying at about 300 mph. then it made a sonic boom. after that, it started going faster and time started to slow down the ufo suddenly dissapeared. the helicopters circled the area and then headed west. that night the ufo was shown on the nightly local news.
content.summary: The ufo was a disc shaped ufo and sped off

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a friend were heading down long desert road.
i was driving friend mario was riding shotgun. we were just getting out from apple valley high school. was around 2:30 3:00pm.
heading down bear valley rd. going tords lucerne valley. 
close to death valley. in the high desert.
we both saw off to the slite right (our 2:00) over the mountins a ball in the sky. lookt to be about 2000 feet up and was the size of a dime in the sky. it was a very clear sunny day.  we both were pointing and asking eachother "what is that?"  was a perfect circal and was blending colors.
reds  blues greens. colors blending at a fast rate. object was very still at this time. changing colors as i drove stright down the road.
watching it for about four minutes when object shot in a blink of an eye to our left field of view (our 11:00).  shot at a slite downword angal behined a small mountin maybe 20 miles away. as soon as the ufo was behined the small mt. there was a short bright white flash of light.
i dont know if this ufo crasht or what the short white flash was from.
we both felt this was a ufo sighting.  we never heard anything about it
from anyone else in the area. 
caleb r.
content.summary: Large ball high in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a friend were in my backyard getting ready to throw some darts in our shed, when i decided to search for satellites in the night sky. being from the mojave desert, i've always been a sky watcher, and i take advantage of the few clear skies that we have in oakland. after a couple of minutes looking up, i saw what i first thought was a white owl, or a flock of birds, but it turned out to be a triangular set of lights overhead travelling north at a high rate of speed. there were six lights in a delta pattern, and i'm still not sure if it was one craft, or a formation of smaller craft. they appeared to be the size of a 747 flying at approximately 4000ft. my friend failed to see them, as they were faint, and difficult to spot. no noise accompanied the sighting. i should also mention that there were absolutely no jets travelling overhead at the time (which is unusual for an area with three major airports). the lights disappeared over the horizon within seconds. now my eyes are glued to the sky, and within five minutes, another craft or formation flew overhead in the same direction, at the same speed. this time it appeared to be in the shape of a chevron. there were six faint, white lights. my friend unfortunately missed this one as well, but instantly after it faded into the mist and city lights, another set of lights followed it. this last craft (or set of craft) was odd shaped. there were approximately seven faint lights that started as a triangle on the right, but with a couple of lights sticking out to the left. i have a feeling that this was a formation of individual craft. we both saw this odd sighting, and my friend described it as "a set of bowling pins" moving through the sky. the following night we decided to take a look to see if any more appeared overhead. it was 7:00 and after a half hour, we spot another formation, this time moving nnw. it started out as a v shape, but by the time that it was overhead, the lights changed position with respect to one another. i don't know if it was one object that was pivoting as it was flying, or if these multiple craft were able to change position within close proximity of one another, while moving at an incredibly fast speed. the strange thing about this sighting, was that there was plenty of air traffic at the time. a boeing 737 and a 767 flew over within seconds of this "thing" passing overhead. i don't know how they wouldn't have been able to see it. what we saw was not a flock of birds, a conventional aircraft, or any other object commonly known to man. they were large, very fast moving, and were silent as can be. their lights were defined, and were round and white/cream colored. the craft were able to move from horizon to horizon in about 8 seconds. if i had not been focused on the sky in an attempt to see satellites, i would never have spotted them. thanks for your time.
content.summary: Multiple craft or formations of faint, slient craft flying overhead.

content.detailedDescription: Fist i appologize for not having the cell phone that doesnt have a camera it was around 7:45 to 8:00 p.M. eastern time. i work in and around the mines here in the appellation mountians. the area this occured at was a place called big creek on top our impoundment pond.That is a small man made lake that catches slurry, and its usually on the main top of a mountain. i was working the refuse belt lines, getting ready to take break. i carry my cell phone with me at all times i called up my wife with the usual i miss you chit chat, when all of a sudden this bright flash flickered up in the sky .My first reaction was excitement, because right away i knew this was no ordinary aircraft. it was close no more than a mile away and it almost made me run like a scared baby. this first flash\flicker lasted only about 5-7 seconds. my first thought is a meteor, or a firecracker, only this didnt move. then suddenly the second flash; this was not at all like the first, this was more like a spotlight on a lighthouse with a greenish hue color. this lasted for more than 6 minutes long enough to get a good picture; oh how i wish i had a camera.The most peculiar thing about it was it stayed in the same spot,and where it was dark it was diffucult to tell the distance. there was also a plane flying over ,(and i know the pilot had to see it also)in the sky almost where this light was. the next time it came on the light changed to almost a solid red ,it was more like the first  flickering, not like the spotlight.Judging from the distance i was looking it couldn't have been more than mile or two off and not more than twenty five hundred feet up. this color also lasted about 5 min. (i had a clock on my phone.) it still hadn't moved horizontally or vertically ,and also it didnt have any trails like meteors and fireworks normally do. after this last flash dance it went out and never came back on,like it was extinguished, nor did i see it on any more of my shifts later. i was not a beliver in ufo's or alien lifeforms,mostly i didnt believe without proof. again i am sorry for not getting any photos of this spectacle,(that i regret the most). thank you for taking the time to read my story and if there is anybody out there with similar encounters please email me at jared@kymail.Com//
content.summary: Mostly flickering up in the sky but not no constant.

content.detailedDescription: I live in riverside,california and the reason i decided to post this picture on a forum (generally a ufo site) is to find an explanation to this object i caught with my camera. i decided to take pictures of clouds to put it in my desktop when i noticed a bright object on the sky above the hill after i took the pictures without knowing that there was an object in the sky. it does not look like any aircraft that i know of or a bird and if you look closely a redish trail is visible. i took 3 pictures of this (the last one came alittle blureish) and if anyone has any idea of what this object can be please respond. (the picture is pretty big,i use a sony 7.2 megapixel cybershot)
content.summary: A bright circle above a hill leaving a trail.

content.detailedDescription: Amateur astronomer viewing full, bright moon, and planets in clear sky; low humidity, no cloud cover - 450 power reflector telescope. direction: east; towards pompano beach [distance to beach approx. seven miles]. slow-rising boomerang shape formation of fluorescent disks out of the east. first thought: spielberg promo for christmas release of "close encounters." turned telescope on front area of formation, seeking aircraft "towing" formation. none seen. attempted to resolve disks to closeup; could not. could not gauge height, distance, or size of formation, when meterite "burn" occured in front of boomerang. height: over 100,000 ft.? watched slow rise of formation towards overhead constellation of orion; boomerang intersecting belt of constellation, and obscuring first two stars of horizontal belt within dark, empty space of boomerang! arc continued over eliptic and, as any large extra-terrestrial body, did not continue down horizon [as might an aircraft passing overhead], but "fell off sky" as would an extra-terrestrial body passing the planet at a great distance. size then estimated equivalent to as large as planetoid. contacted ft. lauderdale airport to report sighting. was told i was one of four reporting. offered washington, d.C. telephone number instituted by president carter for ufo sighting reports. called, and reported sighting. received telephone confirmation call shortly thereafter, and a second call at 6:30 a.M. from professor hynek from california, who asked me pertinent astronomical questions regarding the sighting, and then requesting i watch feb. tv show [ufo]; jack webb production to see "mother ship" first seen in 1888, and again in 1950 [corroborated by retired admiral vacationing in arizona rv site who saw exactly like i did, the "mother ship" reported]. placed sighting on ufo computer site, and received, a number of years later, a corroborative response from individual who, with two friends, was fishing off pompano beach when they sighted same as i...With one exception. individual insisted little "red light" left mother ship and buzzed their boat, and caused an incoming piper cub to go down and crash onto beach. he never reported, for all three were not supposed to be where they were that night. regardless i shouted for viewer support from neighbors, my sighting was made alone, with no real corroborative evidence. but, like lou costello of the movies used to say: "i saw what i saw when i saw it!"
content.summary: 19-20 fluorescent small disks against a boomerang form single ship

content.detailedDescription: I have never reported this before but feel compelled to now as it troubles me. i also experienced an earlier sighting with my wife on nov 23, 1976.The 1976 event was made in wayne, nj returning from my wife's grandmothers house. on the road we saw a flat looking oval shaped object passing south to north quickly in the clear sky. it seemed to be at a high altitude with a pale white color. it quickly accelerated and disappeared in 10 seconds. our second event occurred on august 12, 1991. my son thomas and i were sitting on lawn chairs to observe the pleiades meteor shower. suddenly we both became aware that the star field above was blacked out, followed by the observation of what seemed to be a triangular shaped body with squared off corners and lights at the front and rear which were very palish in color. as i am red/green color vision deficiecient i only saw a bluish color but htere were other colors across the rear. the object emitted a humming sound not unlike the 60 cycle hum one hears from an electric motor. when first noticing this object i was certain it was not an aircraft despite the fact that airlines pass over my house at approximately 19-20,000 feet en-route to newark approach. being familiar with aircraft and being an usaf veteran i know that the object i saw on august 12, 1991 was not an airplane. what intrigues me is this objects altitude seemed very low, possibly 1000 feet and it's sudden departure upward was instant. my son thomas will vouch for this report as will my wife for the nov 1976 sighting. glad to get this off my chest.
content.summary: Observing sky for pleiades meteor shower, my son (11 years old at the time)  witnessed a huge trianglular object passing overhead with pale lighting and a humming sound

content.detailedDescription: First of all i am from mexico so i apologize for my spelling. i was in bed at around 9.00 am  i think it was sunday when my dad started telling me to get up (from bed) and go to the back yard to see someting funny in the sky,(northwest direction).   him and i often at nigh like to observe the sky and atually we have seen funny lights he always likes to look up to the sky;   i ingnore him because i was tired, for some reason my wafe got out of bed to do something else, so my dad took the oportunity to show my wife what he was looking at and she saw it also, i still was in bed whet i ask my wife whats was it like and she said to me thas it was something thas changed shapes, it was around 9:30 am. so i got curious and decided to go and look,  my dad and i have a pair of binoculars his are 20x80 and mine are 25x100 celestron both with stands or tripods (sorry for my spelling) since his binoculars where already set i took a look throw his , i wear correcting glasses so one eye was more clear the the other one, when i looked at the object i got so ecxited and set my binoculars also and this is what i see: ooooooo  because of the distance i am not sure if they were apart but to me they formed only one object never on horizontal position i did it that way so you can see the shape using the o  letter,  it was on vertical position stationary problably very long with out binoculars it appear like a shinny star and me movements it did to me were like a number 9 , question mark, horse shoe, sea horse , a capital l ,  it apear to be made of silver like color, or maybe like vapor claud,   i coll 911 and told them what i was seeing the direction , the shape, color , they asked were i was, my name , my address, and told me to wait (aprox. 2 minutes) then again ask me somethin else dont remember the question and made me wait for about one more minute,  then she gaveme some website address to see if they had some phone number to call them ( which i never did call) and that was it finally i went to my neighbor's house and him and his two sons also saw the object, it took like three hours to disapear maybe because some clauds.
content.summary: Like joined spheres forming like ,quiestion mark, l , musical note, c, horizontal line , with blue joints between the sphares.

content.detailedDescription: Nice morning,some sun.I was sitting on my front porch,it was quiet.When all of a sudden this thing flys from my right this side of post,in front of me,past me,around the outside of other post swung around and flew away to my left.I stood up.Went to the rail and tried to see it going away.No way.It was clear like a jelly fish,not shiney.Twisted as it flew.No sound,except slight soft hiss when flew past me.I was surprised,i seen all kinds of things,never that.Iwent down the stairs to the street,and looked around hopeing to see some one else that seen it too.Nope.No one around.Ive asked very few about this and,well,you know,not sure what to say except i did witness this as i discribed,i swear.Barry g.
content.features: Patterned Surface,  Appendage(s),  Louvres,  Wings,  Other
content.summary: Opaqe flying dna type strand,10 in.Or so.Twisted taperd shape,fast .Alert!!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was around to see the shuttle lift off when i saw an egg shaped ufo, almost like an almond out of its shell.  it changed shape into a sphere and light sped away.  about the same time...Disney filmed a movie called flight of the navigator.... watch that movie and tell me nasa doesn't have ufo technology.
content.summary: Nut shell ufo in florida in the 1980's

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 6 years old. it was in the middle of the day and the temperature was super high. (my house was located about two miles away from the historic zapotec ruins of monte alban and so people were passing by my neighborhood all the time trying to get there,the house was located on top of a hill and very few houses existed around it back then, the other hills also had houses scadered all over so all the homes were visible to eachother )......I remember sitting in the yard of my house playing with a stick and a toy car ,i leaned over to reach for a bag of something but i lost balance and fell on my side. when i picked my self up i, i looked across to the other hill (about 1/8 of a mile)and noticed that something bright and shinny was hovering over my neighbor's house(at that time in my life i had no concept of aliens or ufos). i went inside my house and called my two sisters, they were about seven and ten years older than i. we went outside and just stood there and watched the bright obeject hover or the neighbor's house. it was almost as if someone was using a huge mirror and was holding it perfectly still and then moving it about 90-100ft in the air. the object was bright no matter what movement it made, it would go up in a perfect line and then come back down, it would also move to the sides super fast and then stay ferfectly still. at some point the object came down to the front of the house and remained unmoved for about 2 minutes, we did not say anything to eachother because we were still trying to figureout what it was in our heads. finally the object got up to about 50ft off from the top of the house and it slowly faded, until we couldn't see any of it anymore. our neighbor was not home, she worked at the local market and her children were at church at the time, only one other neighbor saw the ufo and they were freaked out by it, i had no idea why, but they were praying like crazy for the next few days.
i had forgotten about the incident until about three years ago when my family was having dinner and we started talking about our old house, then i realised i had witnessed a ufo along time ago.
content.summary: Bright object hovering over my neighbor's home in oaxaca mexico

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car with my friend parker and his dad after i had went to his house to study for exams and we were driving and we saw a big ball of light traveling about a couple hundred miles per hour in a straight line with a little bit of smoke like substance coming out of the back but it had like a light rainbow color to the smoke and we saw it and it just dissapeared out of nowhere and we had no sight of it after that. p.S. it didn't look like anything like fire works.
content.summary: A ball of white/yellow light, just appered out of nowhere, traveled straight lined and dissapeared, from were i looked like a softball size.

content.detailedDescription: Although this event occured over 10yrs ago, it is permenantly burnt into my memory.  this is the first official report i have made, however it is not the first time i've shared my experience.  in fact, when it happened, i was not alone.  altoona, the city i live in, is a small city nestled in the appalacian mts., thus having lots of hills and valleys.  it was atop one of these hills that my story begins.  i remember being with two of my friends in a section of town called pleaseant valley.  we were invited to go to a girls house, because she liked one of my friends and her parents were'nt home.  while we were there my friend "jon" and i went out on her 2nd floor deck to smoke cigarettes and leave them alone.  it was then that i looked up and saw what i can only now describe as well the single largest object that i have ever seen.  and to think that this thing was flying is astonishing.  at first, i just noticed stars disappearing and then parts of clouds.  i told "jon" to look up too, and although i took his eyes a while to focus on the object, for it was jet black, he said in his slow norther drawl, and i will always remeber this, "what the f*%k is that thing!"  next thing i did was call into the house for my lucky friend and his female companion.  my sheer excitement made them come rushing out and just as they reached the deck the object was flying over the sunken space between two hills.  in this sunken area sits a lowes hardware store.  lowes lit up the night sky and the valley like a beacon in the night, as it has until the recent development of a mall at the top of the very hill it rests beneath.  but for the first time we could really see the object.  it was massive, dark, overbearing, silent, frightening.  this was not your usual sighting.  no lights, no supersonic speed,no sound, nothing.  it just moved silently through the night sky swallowing it up as it passed.  it was truely amazing.  in the light, what we did see was also very unusual.  the front came to a point, while the back was squared off.  underneath, there was large structers that hung down, while dented crater shaped areas pocked the bottom.  other than that, there was no more detail about the object i can report for certain.  eventually it just glided away, the same way it came, soundless, lightless, and very very slowly.
content.summary: An astonishingly massive object that seemed to have no color slowly crept across the sky above me at no more than 200ft.

content.detailedDescription: @ hwy 90 and gult city road going south veiwed triangular vehicle with three lights white in color, vehicle frame at night appeard black, direction south east on my left about a quarter @ arms lenghth vehicle move in the general direct of eglins air force base in fort walton florida. object move smooth as though it was gliding, at last veiwing object was 1/2 dime size and low in horizon and lost to trees. with renewed base activity this may be worth an extra look. when object was last seen all three lights on bottom and in corners could still be made out. i hope this report can be forwarded to a person southeast of me tonight as it appeared to be fixed in its path. mr cannon
content.summary: Veiwed while rideing motor cycle at night spotted vehicle at a steady pase

content.detailedDescription: I hiked with a friend in the ute valley park (in colorado springs). at h17:40 mst +/- 10min, we were returning and coming out of the park, back at the beginning of the trail, after a 2hrs round trip hike. the trail here appears as a dirt road, getting into the park from mule deer drive. the way we were coming out of the park, this section of the trail (a couple of hundred yards), goes relatively steeply downhill, facing west and pikes peak. we were admiring the sunset sky and the beautiful view next to home. despite the cold, the day has been nice and sunny, then it turned overcast later and we were glad we got out for a hike. as we were coming down this last section of the trail, i noticed a strange light, appearing approximately as a horizontal segment of light, against the evening sky, just above the saddle to the south, in the skyline of pikes peak. i hiked pikes peak (14,110ft., or 14,115ft. lately) about half dozen times and i recognize the profile of the peak and its skyline. on top there is the cog train station, a meteo station and a few poles. from where i was (near mule deer entrance in ute valley park), the light was to the west. the white light (like that of a headlight) was significantly to the left of the peak, from my vantage point - that is, south of the peak. it was shaped like a horizontal segment. initially i thought that might be the landing lights of a plane, facing in our direction, though i have never seen anything like that, in that position (i live in the area for seven years and i have a view of pikes peak from home). the size was not right (it was way too large), given the apparent distance. the intensity of the light seemed way too much for a few headlights, even those of a plane, given the apparent distance to them. plus, the light was not moving, which was unusual if it came from a plane. the light seemed to might have moved slightly around, but remained approximately in the same position. initially, the light appeared like a stronger source of light, not circular or star-like, but more linear, oriented horizontally. it appeared larger than the apparent size of the cog train station, plus it was located clearly south of pikes peak (left of the peak, from my vantage point). the sky was quite bright, after the sunset, when we first noticed the light. initially, my friend thought it might be a star, but the light looked quite different from a twinkling star. it gradually looked more and more different than the point-like source of light (like stars are). the sky was also getting gradually darker. the light slowly appeared like the top sketch ("obs 1") shown in file attached. it was not a clear, big image, but that\'s how it appeared to me, after it started simpler, as a horizontally oriented, linear source of white light. about a couple of minutes later, the light appeared to me as shown in the second sketch ("obs 2") in the attached file. i was trying hard to explain away what i was seeing, but i could not, so i tried to observe the sight as well as i could. images in the attached file show what i saw with the naked eye. we rushed home - i wanted to grab a pair of binoculars - where we arrived at h17:50 mst. the snow and ice on the road slowed us down. as we were exiting ute valley park (towards mule deer drive) and losing elevation, the light disappeared below and behind the mountains / pikes peak skyline. i grabbed two pairs of binoculars from home and rushed back to ute valley park. by this time (about h18:00 mst), the sky was dark and i saw no light in that particular region of the sky. i did see other stars in the sky, but no light like the one i have seen earlier. this sighting remains unexplained to me.
content.summary: Unusual light in the sky, mostly steady, towards west, slightly above pikes peak skyline

content.detailedDescription: Driving home, thought being chased.  when i came over the hill toward my remote home i saw 15 objects sitting still hovering.  seemed to be emitting light energy.  i went into house and got video camera.  took lots of video adn i think even an entity and maybe some rods. i felt anxious and my heart was racing while doing the video taping.  i felt ok after.  the alien looked like a demon to me. i kept taping until the battery died on the camera then i went into the house and stayed awake to daylight as i was a little anxious over what i saw. digital tape being duplicated and dvd will be given to mufon state director.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Several objects video taped

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:55 pm as i was standing in my yard, i noticed a strange object in the night sky. i called for my neighbors to come out and see a ufo. they immediately came and out and  i told them where to look. a bright white, cigar shaped object, traveling nnw to sse at a high altitude and great speed, was visible. it was visible until it dropped past the horizon line. it made no sound, no changes in direction, and no contrails were observed. my neighbors brought a digital camera outside with them and took a photo of it. we all agreed that whatever it was, it was unique to anything we had ever seen before. that's when i learned of the photo.We then downloaded the pic into my computer and opened it. to our surprise, it showed even stranger things.The object was "fishook" shaped, with a black field surrounding it, and some kind of aura outside of that. i then decided to enhance and rotate it for a better perspective view. the results are even stranger still. we were all 3 in awe and amazement as we watched it cross the sky and after an initial "wow, what's that" we watched in silence until it was gone from view. object was brighter than any star and didn't look like any satellite. it is hard to estimate an overall size, but it was between  1/8"-1/4" long to the naked eye, and was at a high altitude. there were no other aircraft visible in the sky, which was totally devoid of cloud cover, with an unlimited range of visibility. all 3 of us are amazed that it hasn't been mentioned on any news, and don't believe we could be the only 3 people who saw it. i have filed reports with ufoseek, nuforc, and komu news which is the local nbc affiliate. please contact me if there is anything you'd like to ask. 
rev. billy heil
p.S. 1st photo (ufo.Jpg) is a copy of the original and unaltered, 2nd photo is enhanced, enlarged and rotated for better perspective view. the memory stick with original photo is available for examination as well.
content.summary: Ufo sighting over central missouri

content.detailedDescription: taking photo of eagles.I cropped it in while editting.A ufo. i can't because i didn't see it move. i felt ok
content.summary: I took a picture of a hawk and noticed the ufo when i cropped it in.

content.detailedDescription: taking photo of eagles.I cropped it in while editting.A ufo. i can't because i didn't see it move. i felt ok
content.summary: I took a picture of a hawk and noticed the ufo when i cropped it in.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a rocket take off from wimberly, texas.  it looked like a nasa rocket, while i was staring up at the sky.  wimberly, texas had a ufo meeting which i attended and many others saw the same thing.  i also saw a nasa rocket, i was near nasa, and i looked up at the sky and saw 9 red lights in a triangle shape, then i had hallucinations of travelling in a spaceship from colorado deep space to another planet.  it was like a dream.  i have had many dreams since.  i have had my children, grandchildren abducted and disappeared.  the man i married has alien powers of disappearing, and contacting others like him, using ice cream cones to communicate with them, then the place we went disappears.  i cannot sleep at night, and neither can my sister, she is now in a hospital on life support to get oxygen.  my grandscon, jimmy garman, disappeared in gratz, pennsylvania, and my daughter, disappeared in corpus christi, texas and my 2 great grandchildren disappeared to mexico, all my children, grandchildren, great grandchildren, have been cut off from me.  i am isolated, the man i am with is the only person i ever talk to, no one else, he degrades me to others, to make even my family enemies to me.  i think i married an alien.  he is smart on physicists, chemicals, mind control.  he uses mind control on me and others, and they all do what he says to do.  he took me away from houston, texas where i grew up and took me to alabama, florida, louisiana, montana, california and he installed antennaes all over austin, texas.  his brother sold air space with fcc regulations to someone for millions of dollars.  his brother worked for nasa selling nasa food.  my sister is dying and she was with a man whol also worked at nasa selling security systems, who wanted to know the names and addresses of all my friends and family.  most of them died and i just lost my brother and my sister is dying.  my child disappeared and her 3 children disappeared and her daughter's children disappeared.  they put a device in my broken arm which tracks me and it hurts all the time.  they did this in june, 1986, world trade center, dallas, texas.  i have real weird drems of space travel.  my husband has isolated me from every human being.  he destroyed all my family relationships, and he keeps me isolated from any human contact.  i sit alone every day and if anyone in my family tried to c all me he interrupts their conversation so i can't talk to anytone.  he has the power of mind control over me and my family. or anyone else, i have seen him do amazing things with physisists at nasa.  he never has sex with me, he is only a roommate, the same with my sister.  they are  trying to kill us off.  they treat us like children, commanding we do what they say, and then they interrupt any conversation we have so we can't talk.  my sister had her throat cut up 3 times and she no longer can talk, she is on life support for oxygen to live, she is dying and she can't speak, all my tried to commit suicide, my daughter tried to commit suicide my neice tried to kill herself, her baby and her fetus.  my granddaughterr had 4 abortions, killing 4 of my family.  many many suicide have content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside of my sign shop in dublin california having a cigarette, and i was looking skyward as i normally do, when i noticed a perfectly white, non-reflective! egg shaped object moving very slowly across the sky. this object could not have been larger than a mini-van, and was approximately 100 feet from my position.

i got such a good look at the object that to this day i can remember just how clean and perfect it looked. my skin still get's goosebumps thinking about it.

the object made no strange movements, it stayed straight and was perfectly silent. this sighting was my third, but most important to me since it was my only daytime sighting. there wasn't a cloud in the sky, and was crisp spring morning.

the object traveled south west, and appeared to gain altitude as it disappeared. i noticed the object at about 300 feet up, maybe less and only 100 or 200 feet from my location. we have a military base across the street from the sign shop, camp parks u.S. army reserve. i have always thought that the object was leaving that base.
content.summary: White egg-shaped object slowly passes overhead

content.detailedDescription: My friend, george lehrfeld, and i were driving from san francisco to los angeles.  south of san jose we turned onto hwy 152 to go to hwy 99 (this was before hwy 5 existed).  as we drove east on hwy 152 we were just west of the town of los banos.  the area was mostly farmland and cattle ranches.  george was driving.  i was looking up at the partly cloudy sky when i saw something through the front window.  it was darting into and out of several clouds.  i said, "george! look up there, i think i see a ufo in the clouds!"  i was pointing and george saw it too.  it spent several seconds in a cloud then darted to another cloud.  it visited many dozens of clouds over a wide expanse of the sky.  we both saw it and were a bit freaked out, hoping it wouldn't stop us or abduct us.  there were hardly any other cars out and we decided to not stop and get out, but to just continue on. at one point the flying saucer hovered over some cattle grazing adjacent to us which is when we got a very good look at it.  it was classic flying saucer shaped with a bubble on top and on the bottom. both our mouths were wide open.  i can't recall most of what we said to each other at this time.  time seemed to slow down.  then as it darted into a cloud about 1500' high which was close to being overhead, george had his head out the window as he looked up and i had my head on the dashboard looking up.  we both saw it dart up towards outer space in a southerly direction at a rate of speed so great, that any human being aboard would surely have died from the g forces exhibited. i have never seen anything move that fast before or since. it may have left a "comtrail" but i can't recall for sure. george and i are still friends to this day, but we haven't talked about what we saw together for a long time.  i frankly don't recall how much he still remembers but i intend to call him when he returns from his vacation to ask him.  i'm not sure what county los banos is in but i think its san benito.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying saucer darting into clouds then shooting straight up @hyperspeeds

content.summary: Disc shaped with six red lights on the top

content.detailedDescription: Driving down the gravel road. only car on the road, and we noticed it when we went over the hill. i thought it was a helicopter or a blimp with a banner. it was rectangular amber colored, and sat in the air with no sound or movement. it had a row of windows outlined in black, and the smaller ones that were lined up behind it also had the same description. i didnt say anything to my friend that i saw the windows, but he said "it even had windows" then i knew we both saw it and i wasnt seeing things. it then took off swiftly, changed into a ball of light about the size of the white moon, and came toward the truck in the sky from the nw. then it turned and took off sw and was gone. i wasnt panicked the whole time, but i was glad when it was gone. the next day i read in the laffeyette paper that it was a meteor, but i didnt believe that, because meteors dont take off in other directions and they dont sit in the air without sound, and windows. the size was about the size of a helicopter.
content.summary: Rectangular amber colored, sitting in air, no sound, and no movement

content.detailedDescription: I was alone in my car, driving from santa fe down to albuquerque.  the highway is very straight for miles.  the sun was shining with hardly a cloud in the sky.  somewhere between santa fe & albuquerque something caught my eye as the reflection of the sun bounced off this object.  i looked up and don't recall seeing a super giant blimp, but there it was.  it was maybe 20 times larger than any blimp i ever saw and it was hovering about 2000' over the highway towards the east from my position.  i watched in amazement this huge silvery blimp.  i recall not seeing what i call the undercarriage where people ride in blimps, which was odd.  i watched it for several minutes.  the highway was virtually empty so i was able to watch it while driving about 55 mph going straight.  suddenly it began to turn in place while it hovered.  as it turned in place, which i watched, it disappeared before my eyes.  when i got back to highlands university in las vegas later that day, i mentioned the incident to one of my roommates, greg goodpasture.  greg told me that his dad was a general in the army and was involved in the famous crash at roswell 19 years earlier.  greg suggested it might have been a ufo which seemed plausible.  he told me to keep my eyes out for more as there were many ufo sightings in the area.  i remember beliving in their existance, but seeing one, confirmed it for me in my bones. i have always been afraid to file such reports, fearing who or what might want to interact with me.  i'm not sure if i filed this report in the past, but i no longer fear the result.
content.summary: Saw object hovering & turning. as it turned it disappeared as i watched.

content.detailedDescription: Well in the efternoon around about 4pm, me and my friend was looking out my bedroom window, and i looked up at the mountain and i seen a dark objeck flowing very slowly across the side of the mountain. so i quickly rushed for my phone so i could take a picture for evidence. but strangely whot i could see wot not show up on the screen of my phone. it was very strange, i asked my friend to try and take one but she couldnt suceed on taking the picture either. funnely it looked asthough it was being toed. it was amazing, i have always thought i have seen a ufo but i  have never bin sure, but this time i have never bin more sure, i new egsackly whot it was. it then passed over the top of the mountain. i felt really surprissed,i wonted to call the police everyminute i was watching it but i didnt want to miss a thing. and by the time i realised i shoulda rang them it was too late, it had gone!I was not scared cause i beleave, and i am a huge fan of the x files. the truth is out there!!!
content.summary: Black with sharp corners slow moving

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping and heard a humming sound,it got louder and i rolled onto my left side and saw a round craft approach and hover,i stood up and saw 4 bright lights 2 on top and 2 on the bottom.The light wasnt blinking and they was red on top blue on bottom,another person saw this and was coming over a fence and said for him to stay put,and he drove off.I looked at my watch when i stood up and when the craft shot upwards i looked again and 30 minutes had gone by.I cannot account for about 15 minutes.
content.summary: Came out of north,hoverd,had 4 lights i could see,loss of time,rippled water

content.detailedDescription:
As far as my ufo expierence it took place when i was 10 years in 1968.It was in october and around 8:00 or so in the evening. i was bored and was on my parents sofa on my knees looking out our window that faced north... my arms were folded on the back of the sofa with my chin resting on my arms... i use to like to look out of this window at night as there was an old train depot north of town that i could see from this window..
 
i had been looking out of the window probably for 2 or 3 minutes looking at the train depot when my eyes glanced upward... still looking north and i thought..."wow the moon is perfectly round and orange tonight and it was the biggest that i had ever seen the moon...I stared at what i thought was the moon for a good minute then happened to look off to the northwest and saw the actual moon which was bright in the sky as it was a clear night... i then looked back at the orange object and noticed how perfectly round it was and it was a deep dark orange in color... i watched it another good minute or two... the size of the object was probably about 1 1/2 times bigger than a normal full moon. 
then all of a sudden this orange object shot off and stopped ...It then appeared to be about half of the size as when i first saw it ...It stayed in this location for about 2 seconds...Shot off again...Looked to be about an 1/8 of the original size...Then shot off again and disappeared...
 
the speed this thing was traveling at reminded me of  when on the old tv series startrek the enterprise would take off and quickly disappear into space...
 
the strangest thing about this was that i remember that i must have been staring right at the object when i first looked out of the window but didn't realize it until all of a sudden i was looking right at it...I guess i must have been daydreaming to not see it right way because all of a sudden it was right there...
content.summary: Saw a perfectly round orange light.
